Interface com.chimu.form.FormThrowInfo

public interface FormThrowInfo
FormException is a generic exception coming from the FORM subsystem. More specific exceptions are generated, see the "see also" section.

FormExceptions provide extra details on who recognized an error, during what stage the error was caused, and who caused it. These may make error recognition easier.
